title: Unable to Connect to PVP.net, only viable fix is being flagged as "3rd party program"
body:
A few days ago for some reason unknown to me I have not been able to connect to the league servers to play a game. It patches fine, it opens the launcher, and then when I log in it fails to connect and closes the launcher.

In that time i tried everything: I resynched the comps clock, I changed my DNS settings, I disabled every possible anti-malware/ firewall that may interfere, I repaired the files, I even reinstalled. 

The only thing that worked was downloading hotspot shield.

Unfortunately when i try and play now I'm getting the bugsplat error and a message telling me I need to disable 3rd party applications. How do I fix this? What Riot god must I pray too?

**TLDR; stopped being able to connect  to PVP.net hotspot shield offered a fix it worked for a few days, and now i'm being flagged for 3rd party applications. what do?**

**EDIT: Now when using hotspot shield I get a bug splat error telling me to disable 3rd party apps**

replies.body: Unfortunately I did all of that before posting this to the forums. I figured I'd get a faster response here than with submitting a ticket but  I guess I'll just submit a ticket.

[Submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) would be a good idea, as by the steps you've described, it sounds like this issue is caused by poor routing to the server. Our tech specialists will be able to investigate further into your issue if you can provide a set of logs with your request using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and our [traceroute instructions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2). Let me know if you have any questions.
Try to right click on the league shortcut , and go into properites and go under the short cut tab and make sure the run as admin box is checked, it seems silly but it acually work,

We definitely don’t want you to miss the party, so here’s the security pass to the [Login Platform.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) Proceed to the steps you haven't yet performed.
